title: Devil's Descent I: purgatory
description: Julian Douglas exists solely for the night he finds his human pet Lily. Lily Walker exists solely for the night she finds peace from the nightmare that is Julian Douglas. Julian finds Lily. Lily suffers Julian. In the end, who finds freedom? The master who is a slave to his pet? Or the pet who never wanted to run away from her vampire master?
author: Claudia D. Christian
